attributes.action: Students should be allowed to wear mosque hats during school
attributes.background:
I would like students to be allowed to wear their religious has, specifically mosque hats for Muslim boy's. 

Students are allowed to wear headscarves and turbans. I would like students to be able to wear mosque hats as well, freely

rejection.details: This is the responsibility of individual schools, not the UK Government or Parliament. You could raise this with your school's governing body.
